page.title: 12Primary School,Fearn.
page.content: We start school at five past nine.We get many different subjects-maths,English,history,geograp hy,science,health,art,gym,handwork and singing.Some use is made of the BBC computer.All classes watch T.V. programmes for schools.At lunch time, recorder and guitar tuition is available.Recreation includes football, swimming,netball, hockey and country dancing.We have two intervals per day.The morning one is from 11 - 11.20am.We can buy crisps and biscuits from our class teacher.Lunch is from 12.40 to 1.40pm..Some pupils take lunch from the school canteen. The meals are cooked at Hilton School.Some take a packed lunch and a few go home.School finishes for the day at 3.30pm.
